turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello. My name is Jae. And who am I speaking with on this fine day?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: HI my name is Gail. How are you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well hello Gail. I am very fine. Thank You for asking. I truly appreciate that. And how is your day today, Gail?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It's great. I made turkey burgers for dinner. Do you like to cook?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: WHAT??!! I just had left over turkey. Mmmmmmmmmm. Turkey sounds great. Sounds much better than my version of turkey. And yes, I like to cook. Do you have any leftover turkey burgers? lol

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I actually do! lol. You should come over and try some! lol. I like spicy food, so I used jalapenos too.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: OMG, Gail!!!! You're a woman after my own heart. Where have you been? ,)

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: LOl I've been in Texas! We love to grill. Where are you from?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I always wanted to visit the "BIG" state. Definitely have to go down south very soon. As for me, I\'m in the BIG Apple, NYC. And speaking of burgers and spicy food, do you share your expertise in these fine foods with charity or charity work?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I used to cook for the local church sometimes.I prepare meals for those in needs.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Awesome, Gail. That is great work indeed. Well, the reason why I ask is because I represent a great organization called, "Save the Children". We are an international non-governmental organization that promotes children\'s rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries and we are looking for donations today. Gail, I need your burgers..............excuse me, your charity in a well to do donation. Can I interest you in this?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sure, I wouldn't mind helping.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Awesome!!!! Gail, as soon we started this conversation, I felt great things about you. The vibe was right. Besides the great charity work at your church establishment, have you done any other types of charity before?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I like helping where I can.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Gail, you are a SAINT!!!! We need more angels like you, especially in today's climate of change. Gail, your provided donation today will essentially help in ensuring children of the world rights to health, education, safety, and most of all, safety. You will make a tangible impact for the world. Would you like some examples, statistics as to why we fight the good fight?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I  like giving back. I usually work through college organizations or a church.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: In histories past to today, we are shown the lack of support for children in developing countries, especially in war torn areas. For instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence. Your donation can address such problems. Gail, my angel. You are part of the solution. Let me ask you, how much money do they spend on unnecessary stuff like a bag of snacks or candy?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would say five dollars.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, that five dollars can be used in more meaningful ways now. Your small donations will indeed help a lot of children and their families. Gail, shall we get started with your donation then?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, of course.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You are amazing, Gail!!!! How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
